page.title: 18*+*+* RECREATION *+*+*
page.content: As there is no theatre or cinema in the Malpas area other forms of entertainment and recreation are flourishing: SPORT>> a large sports club providing football tennis hockey rugby bowls three bowling clubs, all have bar and members room for social meetings. CLUBS> These are numerous, and include Flower arranging soc. Gardening Soc. Womens Institute, Young wives and Mothers Union. Historical Society. to name but a few. Childrens clubs: BEAVERS for boys 6 to 8. CUBS for boys 8 to 10 SCOUTS for boys 10+. BROWNIES for girls 7 to 10 GUIDES for girls 10+. MUSIC CLUB for children 7 to 18 to learn to read music and play a musical instrument as an individual and in ensemble.There are three public houses where people meet for entertainment.
